CloseAsyncRecognitionTask.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: asr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
X-TC-Version: 2019-06-14
X-TC-Region: ap-shanghai
X-TC-Action: CloseAsyncRecognitionTask
X-TC-Timestamp: 1599140162
Authorization: TC3-HMAC-SHA256 Credential=************************************************************/2020-09-03/asr/tc3_request, SignedHeaders=content-type;host, Signature=0615f73a69c6b054affd69e4b1cbb68fbe84ae8024a9347df4aa5054933adac8
<公共请求参数>

{
    "TaskId": 1013279283
}
CloseAsyncRecognitionTask.title: 语音流异步识别任务关闭

CreateAsrKeyWordLib.document: 用户通过上传文件方式创建关键词表
CreateAsrKeyWordLib.input:
https://asr.tencentcloudapi.com/?Action=CreateAsrKeyWordLib
&Name=词表名称& KeyWordFile=<文件base64>
&<公共请求参数>
CreateAsrKeyWordLib.title: 创建关键词表

CreateAsrVocab.document: 用户通过上传词权重数组方式创建热词表
CreateAsrVocab.input:
https://asr.tencentcloudapi.com/?Action=CreateAsrVocab
&Name=词表名称
&Description=词表描述
&WordWeights.0.Word=智聆
&WordWeights.0.Weight=1
&WordWeights.1.Word=滨海大厦
&WordWeights.1.Weight=6
&WordWeights.2.Word=存储桶
&WordWeights.2.Weight=8
&WordWeights.3.Word=核保
&WordWeights.3.Weight=10
&<公共请求参数>
CreateAsrVocab.title: 创建热词表

CreateAsyncRecognitionTask.document: 创建一个异步识别任务，通过接口返回拿到任务ID
CreateAsyncRecognitionTask.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: asr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
X-TC-Version: 2019-06-14
X-TC-Region: ap-shanghai
X-TC-Action: CreateAsyncRecognitionTask
X-TC-Timestamp: 1599140162
Authorization: TC3-HMAC-SHA256 Credential=************************************************************/2020-09-03/asr/tc3_request, SignedHeaders=content-type;host, Signature=0615f73a69c6b054affd69e4b1cbb68fbe84ae8024a9347df4aa5054933adac8
<公共请求参数>

{
    "EngineType": "16k_zh",
    "Url": "rtmp://test.com/test_stream",
    "CallbackUrl": "http://test.com/callback",
    "SignToken": ""
}
CreateAsyncRecognitionTask.title: 语音流异步识别任务创建

CreateCustomization.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: asr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateCustomization
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ModelName": "自学习模型",
    "ModelType": "16k",
    "TextUrl": "http://www.download.com/test.txt"
}
CreateCustomization.title: 创建自学习模型

CreateRecTask.document: 用户通过音频Url的方式（SourceType为0）请求录音识别服务，请求模型为16k中文 （EngineModelType = 16k_zh），音频格式为wav（采样率为16k，单声道）
CreateRecTask.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: asr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
X-TC-Version: 2019-06-14
X-TC-Region: ap-shanghai
X-TC-Action: CreateRecTask
X-TC-Timestamp: 1599142560
Authorization: TC3-HMAC-SHA256 Credential=************************************************************/2020-09-03/asr/tc3_request, SignedHeaders=content-type;host, Signature=524ed61a4a71de417f4fa41249dcb428a0c51013890f24f3492068ca7cd16953
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Url": "http://test.cos.ap-guangzhou.myqcloud.com/test.wav",
    "ChannelNum": 1,
    "EngineModelType": "16k_zh",
    "ResTextFormat": 0,
    "SourceType": 0
}
CreateRecTask.title: 通过音频Url来调用接口

CreateRecTask.document: 用户通过上传音频数据（Data）的方式（SourceType为1）请求录音识别服务，请求模型为16k中文 （EngineModelType = 16k_zh），音频格式为wav（采样率为16k，单声道）
CreateRecTask.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: asr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
X-TC-Version: 2019-06-14
X-TC-Region: ap-shanghai
X-TC-Action: CreateRecTask
X-TC-Timestamp: 1599142560
Authorization: TC3-HMAC-SHA256 Credential=************************************************************/2020-09-03/asr/tc3_request, SignedHeaders=content-type;host, Signature=524ed61a4a71de417f4fa41249dcb428a0c51013890f24f3492068ca7cd16953
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ChannelNum": 1,
    "EngineModelType": "16k_zh",
    "ResTextFormat": 0,
    "Data": "eGNmYXNkZmFzZmFzZGZhc2RmCg==",
    "SourceType": 1
}
CreateRecTask.title: 通过音频数据来调用接口

DeleteAsrKeyWordLib.document: 用户通过该API，传入词表ID，可以删除对应的关键词表
DeleteAsrKeyWordLib.title: 删除关键词表

DeleteAsrVocab.document: 用户通过该API，传入热词表ID，可以删除对应的热词表
DeleteAsrVocab.title: 删除热词表

DescribeAsyncRecognitionTasks.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: asr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
X-TC-Version: 2019-06-14
X-TC-Region: ap-shanghai
X-TC-Action: DescribeAsyncRecognitionTasks
X-TC-Timestamp: 1599140162
Authorization: TC3-HMAC-SHA256 Credential=************************************************************/2020-09-03/asr/tc3_request, SignedHeaders=content-type;host, Signature=0615f73a69c6b054affd69e4b1cbb68fbe84ae8024a9347df4aa5054933adac8
<公共请求参数>

{}
DescribeAsyncRecognitionTasks.title: 查询运行中的任务列表

DescribeTaskStatus.document: 用户通过轮询方式获取识别结果，任务失败，具体原因请用户查看返回中ErrorMsg提示。
DescribeTaskStatus.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: asr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
X-TC-Version: 2019-06-14
X-TC-Region: ap-shanghai
X-TC-Action: DescribeTaskStatus
X-TC-Timestamp: 1599142563
Authorization: TC3-HMAC-SHA256 Credential=************************************************************/2020-09-03/asr/tc3_request, SignedHeaders=content-type;host, Signature=6647fa852c9329ac5aa355c68c838358139c2d941f4ed175dd5858978f5d79c8
Content-Length: 21
<公共请求参数>

{
    "TaskId": 522931820
}
DescribeTaskStatus.title: 轮询结果——任务失败

DescribeTaskStatus.document: 用户通过轮询方式获取识别结果，任务成功，并返回识别结果。
DescribeTaskStatus.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: asr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
X-TC-Version: 2019-06-14
X-TC-Region: ap-shanghai
X-TC-Action: DescribeTaskStatus
X-TC-Timestamp: 1599142563
Authorization: TC3-HMAC-SHA256 Credential=************************************************************/2020-09-03/asr/tc3_request, SignedHeaders=content-type;host, Signature=6647fa852c9329ac5aa355c68c838358139c2d941f4ed175dd5858978f5d79c8
Content-Length: 21
<公共请求参数>

{
    "TaskId": 522931820
}
DescribeTaskStatus.title: 轮询结果——任务成功

DescribeTaskStatus.document: 用户通过轮询方式获取识别结果，任务等待，说明任务还在识别队列中，请用户耐心等候。
DescribeTaskStatus.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: asr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
X-TC-Version: 2019-06-14
X-TC-Region: ap-shanghai
X-TC-Action: DescribeTaskStatus
X-TC-Timestamp: 1599142563
Authorization: TC3-HMAC-SHA256 Credential=************************************************************/2020-09-03/asr/tc3_request, SignedHeaders=content-type;host, Signature=6647fa852c9329ac5aa355c68c838358139c2d941f4ed175dd5858978f5d79c8
Content-Length: 21
<公共请求参数>

{
    "TaskId": 522931820
}
DescribeTaskStatus.title: 轮询结果——任务等待

DescribeTaskStatus.document: 用户通过轮询方式获取识别结果，任务执行中，说明任务已经开始识别，请用户耐心等候。
DescribeTaskStatus.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: asr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
X-TC-Version: 2019-06-14
X-TC-Region: ap-shanghai
X-TC-Action: DescribeTaskStatus
X-TC-Timestamp: 1599142563
Authorization: TC3-HMAC-SHA256 Credential=************************************************************/2020-09-03/asr/tc3_request, SignedHeaders=content-type;host, Signature=6647fa852c9329ac5aa355c68c838358139c2d941f4ed175dd5858978f5d79c8
Content-Length: 21
<公共请求参数>

{
    "TaskId": 522931820
}
DescribeTaskStatus.title: 轮询结果——任务执行中

DownloadAsrVocab.document: 用户通过该接口可以获得相应热词表里的内容， 即 word|weight 形式的 base64 值。
DownloadAsrVocab.title: 下载热词表

GetAsrKeyWordLibList.document: 用户通过该接口，可获得所有的关键词表及其信息。
GetAsrKeyWordLibList.title: 列举关键词表

GetAsrVocab.document: 用户通过热词表ID获取热词表内容
GetAsrVocab.title: 获取热词表

GetAsrVocabList.document: 用户通过该接口，可获得所有的热词表及其信息。
GetAsrVocabList.title: 列举热词表

GetModelInfo.document: 通过模型id获取模型信息
GetModelInfo.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: asr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: GetModelInfo
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ModelId": "5a15aa3ae4c611eda0d56c92bf48cdf2"
}
GetModelInfo.title: 通过模型id获取模型信息

GetUsageByDate.document: 需要查询8月份录音识别和实时识别的用量
GetUsageByDate.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: asr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: GetUsageByDate
<公共请求参数>

{
    "BizNameList": [
        "asr_rt",
        "asr_rec"
    ],
    "StartDate": "2024-08-01",
    "EndDate": "2024-08-31"
}
GetUsageByDate.title: 用量查询输入示例

SentenceRecognition.document: 用户通过语音Url的方式（SourceType为0）请求一句话识别服务，请求模型为电话 8k中文 （EngSerViceType = 8k_zh），音频格式为wav
SentenceRecognition.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: asr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
X-TC-Version: 2019-06-14
X-TC-Region: ap-shanghai
X-TC-Action: SentenceRecognition
X-TC-Timestamp: 1599140162
Authorization: TC3-HMAC-SHA256 Credential=************************************************************/2020-09-03/asr/tc3_request, SignedHeaders=content-type;host, Signature=0615f73a69c6b054affd69e4b1cbb68fbe84ae8024a9347df4aa5054933adac8
<公共请求参数>

{
    "UsrAudioKey": "test",
    "SubServiceType": 2,
    "Url": "http://tes.cos.ap-guangzhou.myqcloud.com/test.wav",
    "ProjectId": 0,
    "EngSerViceType": "8k_zh",
    "VoiceFormat": "wav",
    "SourceType": 0
}
SentenceRecognition.title: 通过语音Url来调用接口

SentenceRecognition.document: 用户通过上传语音数据（Data）的方式（SourceType为1）请求一句话识别服务，请求模型为电话 8k中文 （EngSerViceType = 8k_zh），音频格式为wav
SentenceRecognition.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: asr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json; charset=utf-8
X-TC-Version: 2019-06-14
X-TC-Region: ap-shanghai
X-TC-Action: SentenceRecognition
X-TC-Timestamp: 1599140479
Authorization: TC3-HMAC-SHA256 Credential=************************************************************/2020-09-03/asr/tc3_request, SignedHeaders=content-type;host, Signature=aa5e2b8b16ced1ac9f877c9a92dab641dcd940837f5869a9e933688c181094de
<公共请求参数>

{
    "UsrAudioKey": "test",
    "SubServiceType": 2,
    "ProjectId": 0,
    "EngSerViceType": "8k_zh",
    "VoiceFormat": "wav",
    "Data": "eGNmYXNkZmFzZmFzZGZhc2RmCg==",
    "SourceType": 1
}
SentenceRecognition.title: 通过语音数据来调用接口

SetVocabState.document: 用户通过该接口可以将热词表设置为默认状态（State=1），或者取消默认状态（State=0）。
SetVocabState.title: 设置热词表状态

UpdateAsrKeyWordLib.document: 用户通过该API传入已经创建的关键词表ID，可以更新其相应的内容
UpdateAsrKeyWordLib.input:
https://asr.tencentcloudapi.com/?Action=UpdateAsrKeyWordLibId
&KeyWordLibId=aa6f402f263f12ea856fc81fbecfd0sd
&Name=新的词表名称
&<公共请求参数>
UpdateAsrKeyWordLib.title: 更新关键词表

UpdateAsrVocab.document: 用户通过该API传入已经创建的热词表ID，可以更新其相应的内容
UpdateAsrVocab.input:
https://asr.tencentcloudapi.com/?Action=UpdateAsrVocab
&VocabId=aa6f402f263f12ea856fc81fbecfd0sd
&Name=新的词表名称
&Description=新的词表描述
&<公共请求参数>
UpdateAsrVocab.title: 更新热词表

VoicePrintCompare.document: 比对两段音频的声纹相似度
VoicePrintCompare.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: asr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: VoicePrintCompare
<公共请求参数>

{
    "VoiceFormat": 0,
    "SampleRate": 16000,
    "SrcAudioData": "AAAAADADAAAAA",
    "DestAudioData": "AAAAADADAAAAA"
}
VoicePrintCompare.title: 音频声纹比对

VoicePrintCount.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: asr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: VoicePrintDelete
<公共请求参数>

{}
VoicePrintCount.title: 示例

VoicePrintDelete.document: 删除保存的说话人信息
VoicePrintDelete.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: asr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: VoicePrintDelete
<公共请求参数>

{
    "VoicePrintId": "abc"
}
VoicePrintDelete.title: 说话人删除

VoicePrintEnroll.document: 通过一段音频数据进行说话人注册
VoicePrintEnroll.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: asr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: VoicePrintEnroll
<公共请求参数>

{
    "VoiceFormat": 0,
    "SampleRate": 16000,
    "SpeakerNick": "ross",
    "Data": "UklGRka1CQBXQVZFZm10IBAAAAABAAEAgD4E"
}
VoicePrintEnroll.title: 注册说话人

VoicePrintGroupVerify.document: 提供一段音频数据和提前注册的一组说话人数据进行比对， 返回topN
VoicePrintGroupVerify.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: asr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: VoicePrintGroupVerify
<公共请求参数>

{
    "VoiceFormat": 1,
    "SampleRate": 16000,
    "Data": "UklGRsb7AQBXQVZFZm10IBAAAAAB",
    "GroupId": "test",
    "TopN": 2
}
VoicePrintGroupVerify.title: 说话人验证1:N

VoicePrintUpdate.document: 更新说话人的音频和昵称
VoicePrintUpdate.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: asr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: VoicePrintUpdate
<公共请求参数>

{
    "VoiceFormat": 0,
    "SampleRate": 0,
    "SpeakerNick": "abc",
    "VoicePrintId": "abc",
    "Data": "abc"
}
VoicePrintUpdate.title: 说话人更新

VoicePrintVerify.document: 验证音频和说话人id是否一致
VoicePrintVerify.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: asr.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: VoicePrintVerify
<公共请求参数>

{
    "VoiceFormat": 0,
    "SampleRate": 16000,
    "VoicePrintId": "KJHGUGKGGGFGYFVDA",
    "Data": "UklGRiRTBwBXQVZFZm10IBAA"
}
VoicePrintVerify.title: 说话人验证
